title: Tech Forum 2026: GW-level AI data centers become new norm as Taiwan supply chain eyes energy storage and fuel cell opportunities
description: The rising demand for AI servers is driving rapid growth in data center power consumption. Low-carbon energy technologies such as fuel cells and energy storage batteries are seen as key advantages for Taiwan's supply chain.
content:
